description: Mark a notification as read. Accepts MarkAsReadInput with notificationId (required, ID/UUID). Updates isRead to true and sets readAt timestamp. Returns updated Notification with id, title, message, type, priority, isRead (true), readAt (DateTime). User isolation enforced - users can only mark their own notifications. Raises NotFoundError (404) if notification not found. Raises ForbiddenError (403) if user doesn't own notification.
graphql_operation: mutation MarkNotificationAsRead($input: MarkAsReadInput!) { notifications { markAsRead(input: $input) { id title isRead readAt } } }
